attributes.action: Making swimming lessons compulsory requirement for all children aged 4-11
attributes.additional_details: Prevent many drownings which happen each year
attributes.background: Financial aid so that all children have the accessibility to learn to swim

rejection.details:
Swimming instruction is already compulsory for key stages 1 and 2 as part of the National Curriculum. You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/national-curriculum-in-england-physical-education-programmes-of-study/national-curriculum-in-england-physical-education-programmes-of-study#swimming-and-water-safety
